name: Aethermoor Courier-Class Airship
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Blueprint cutaway: Aethermoor Courier-Class Airship, top/side/cross-section/decks, ballast, pressure hulls, engines, crew, clean blueprint, fantasy nautical/aeronautical vernacular with realm materials, skyward romantic realism, cloudstone and brass, wind-swept forms, airship motifs, sturdy functional blueprint vernacular, palette: navy, gold, cloud-white, warm sun highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Use numbered callout pins (01, 02, 03â€¦) instead of long text annotations. Include a clean legend area without rendering complex paragraphs., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Blueprint cutaway of Aethermoor Courier-Class Airship.
callouts: numbered pins 01..10; legend area reserved; no paragraph labels
revised_prompt: Immerse in the world of heroic tabletop fantasy, reminiscent of D&D. Picture a medieval-fantasy scenario devoid of modern technology, with a unified painterly collection style. The focus is an Aethermoor Courier-Class Airship, presented as a detailed blueprint cutaway. Visualize from various perspectives - top, side, cross-section, and decks. Include essential components such as ballast, pressure hulls, engines, and crew. Maintain nautical/aeronautical vernacular from the fantasy realm's materials. Strive for romantic realism, as though looking skyward amidst cloudstone and brass structures with wind-swept forms. Colors: navy, gold, cloud-white with warm sun highlights. Use sequential numbered callouts (01, 02, 03...) rather than lengthy text. A neat legend area is desired, without complex paragraphs. Steer clear of random letter strings; opt for meaningful symbols or numeric pins. Avoid elements of sci-fi UIs, photoreal CGI, or anime style, and no bloom glare. Channel a functional, sturdy airship blueprint aesthetic wrapped in fantasy.
